title: Sword Combat Sounds (Weapons)
description: 116 combat sounds for sword and other weapons, perfect for RPG/Fantasy video games.
longDescription:
Hello Creators!


Here's my new pack: “Sword Combat Sounds (weapons)“


Please check the preview of the sounds on YouTube

List of SFX included


The approach for this pack was to create some realistic sword sounds suitable for combats for RPG/Fantasy video games (although this sounds can be used in different other genres and other audiovisual creations.

In this pack there is different actions a sword can make like: slash, cut, armour hit, block, collision, critical hit, wounds, whooshes,  hits to shields, etc...


I hope you enjoy implementing this sounds in your project!


Related Packs (created by me)

Fantasy Combat Sounds

Blood & Wounds Sounds


Making-Off

I recorded metal objects in my garage and then processed this recordings (made with my Zoom H6) in Logic Pro X with tools like: PitchMonster, MTransformer, Logic Pro X sampler, Logic Pro X stock plugins, etc...

Soon I will upload the making-off video.


Some considerations

1. Keep in mind this sounds can be used in a variety of situations, I put a name to the SFX but this doesn’t mean it can’t be used in other contexts.

Check out this guide that maybe will help you

2. The sounds are in 44.1Khz/16 bit format. I have the original files at 96khz/24bit also, if you need this format, please contact me.


Contact

Any doubt, any idea, any proposal, please contact me on: the.sound.guild.sfx@gmail.com


Check all my packs

The Sound Guild
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 116

Number of Audio Cues: 116

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 1 minute 40 seconds
